import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import CustomLoader from '../custom_loader' import axios from 'axios'; import {useParams} from "react-router-dom"; export default function MenuStudio() { const [laodingStatus, setlaodingStatus] = useState(false) const [newPageTitle, setnewPageTitle] = useState("") const [pagesList, setPagesList] = useState([]) const {menuId,menuName} = useParams() function getMenuPages(){ axios.get('page?menu_id='+menuId) .then(res => { setPagesList(res.data) setlaodingStatus(false) }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.message) }) } function submitNewPage() { if (newPageTitle.length == 0) alert("Page title required") else{ setlaodingStatus(true) axios.post(`page`, {name:newPageTitle,menu_id:menuId}) .then(res => { getMenuPages() setnewPageTitle("") }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.response.data.message); }) } } getMenuPages() return (
